sentence.Network_en: Such a view implies that our bodies and sexual nature are inherently ungodly.
sentence.Network_cn: 这样的观点暗示我们的身体和性本能天生就是邪恶的。

sentence.Network_en: Why are you phoning at this ungodly hour ( of the night )?
sentence.Network_cn: 你为什麽在 ( 夜里 ) 这个时候打电话来?

sentence.Network_en: Why ring me up at this ungodly hour!
sentence.Network_cn: 怎么在这时候打电话给我!

PerfectNetExp.abs: 那个年代，摇滚乐时常被宗教领袖们抨击为不敬神的(ungodly)。Don在引用歌名的同时，也有意识地为摇滚乐表达了些许的委屈、愤懑。
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(U1)|无忧教育 ... ungodliness 无信心 ungodly 无信心的 ungovernable 难管制的.
罪恶的相关英语词汇大全 - n词酷英汉词典 ... atone1.  补偿 ungodly1. 不敬神的；不虔诚的 unrighteous1.  邪恶的；有罪的.
...去误解或曲解它，以适合你们自己的目的；去合理化那些不敬神（ungodly）的行为。

list.abs: 生活大爆炸学习笔记(上) ... grilled cheese： 烤奶酪 4.精选语录 ungodly hour： 不能容忍的时间 lay low： 打倒,击败.
had to leave for work at an ungodly hour .在令人不能容忍时间不得不外出工作。
Thanks for coming at this ungodly hour , Doc., 谢谢你在这个不幸的时候过来 , 医生.
she declared it to be ungodly performance , and one that she for her part would never countenance .她断言这是荒唐行为，她本人是决不赞成这种活动的。
vindicate me , O God , and plead my case against an ungodly nation ; O deliver me from the deceitful and unjust man !诗43:1神阿、求你伸我的冤、向不虔诚的国、为我辨屈．求你救我脱离诡诈不义的人。

entry.tran: 不道德的；违背宗教教义的
entry.def: If you describe someone or something as ungodly, you mean that they are morally bad or are opposed to religion.

example.ex: Such a view implies that our bodies and sexual nature are inherently ungodly.
example.tran: 这样的观点暗示我们的身体和性本能天生就是邪恶的。

entry.def: If you refer to a time as an ungodly hour, you are emphasizing that it is very early in the morning.
If you refer to the amount or volume of something as ungodly, you mean that it is excessive or unreasonable.

means.word_mean: 1. characterized by iniquity; wicked because it is believed to be a sin;

sentences.sentence: "he said it was sinful to wear lipstick"

means.word_mean: 2. lacking piety and reverence for a god

auth_sentence.content: His sport was disapproved of...as frivolous and ungodly.
auth_sentence.res_content: His sport was disapproved of...as frivolous and ungodly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His sport was disapproved of...as frivolous and ungodly.

auth_sentence.content: Critics, especially the clergy, claimed it was repulsive and ungodly to inocculate someone with material from a diseased animal.
auth_sentence.res_content: Critics, especially the clergy, claimed it was repulsive and ungodly to inocculate someone with material from a diseased animal.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Critics, especially the clergy, claimed it was repulsive and ungodly to inocculate someone with material from a diseased animal.
